Content: A shooting incident was reported from a jewellery shop in Thalawathugoda this afternoon (02). At around 12.50 pm, two persons had attempted to rob a jewellery shop and then the owner of the shop had struggled with the robbers. The owner had a sharp object in his possession and then one of the robbers had opened fire. It had caused injuries to the shop owner and he was later hospitalized. In the meantime, the robbers have fled the scene.
